rt

Interface Camera

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyCamera, FixedCamera

    public interface Camera
    Given the specification of a ray in image space, a camera constructs a corresponding ray in world space.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ray makeWorldSpaceRay(int i, int j, float[] sample)
      Given a ray in image space, make a ray in world space according to the camera specifications.

    • Method Detail

      • makeWorldSpaceRay

        Ray makeWorldSpaceRay(int i,
                    int j,
                    float[] sample)
        Given a ray in image space, make a ray in world space according to the camera specifications. The method receives a sample that the camera can use to generate the ray. Typically the first two sample dimensions are used to sample a location in the current pixel. The samples are assumed to be in the range [0,1].
        Parameters:
        i - pixel column index
        j - pixel row index
        sample - random sample that the camera can use to generate a ray
        Returns:
        the ray in world coordinates
